info.name: Way of the Geisha Monastic Tradition

description.p: Monks of the Way of the Geisha are dedicated to the traditional arts. They put their talents to use entertaining customers on the occasion of banquets and performances. Geisha are also skilled in the art of seduction, able to charm their patrons through conversation, song, and dance. A traveling geisha may enjoy pretending to be an innocent willow or an alluring flower, but in battle, a geisha's training and enchanting beauty transforms them into a fierce fighter.

When you choose this tradition at 3rd level, you gain proficiency with the Performance and Persuasion skills. Your proficiency bonus for these checks is doubled when making a Charisma (Performance) or Charisma (Persuasion) check in an intimate setting. You also gain proficiency with two instruments of your choice.

sheet.description: Your proficiency bonus for Performance or Persuasion checks is doubled when making a check in an intimate setting.

description.p: At 3rd level, you gain the ability to move with such entrancing beauty that your movements can’t be predicted. When attempting to shove or grapple a creature, you can make a Dexterity (Acrobatics) check instead of a Strength (Athletics) check. After attemping a shove or a grapple, you can make one unarmed strike as a bonus action.

sheet.description: When attempting to shove or grapple a creature, you can make a Acrobatics check instead of an Athletics check. After attemping a shove or a grapple, you can make one unarmed strike as a bonus action.

description.p: At 6th level, you gain the ability to get into a person’s mind with a soft caress of the cheek. You can expend 1 ki point and use your bonus action to alluringly touch a creature within 5 feet of you. That target must make a Wisdom saving throw against your Ki save DC. A creature that is immune to being charmed automatically succeeds on its saving throw. On a failure, the target has disadvantage on checks and saving throws it makes in response to your monk features or attacks. At the end of each of its turns, and each time you inflict damage to it, the target can make another Wisdom saving throw. You must not have damaged this target for at least the past hour in order to target it with this feature.

description.p: Starting at 11th level, your past hardships have allowed you to steel yourself in times of fatigue. When you would gain a point of exhaustion, you can choose not to. Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: When you would gain a point of exhaustion, you can choose not to.

description.p: Starting at 17th level, your gentle embrace is irresistible. Any creature who targets you with an attack or harmful spell while under the effect of your Sensual Touch feature must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature must choose a new target or lose the attack or spell.
Additionally, you can now use your Sensual Touch feature on creatures you have recently damaged.
